title: Alibaba's Jack Ma: From English Teacher To One Of China's Richest Men
teaser: A new film called "Crocodile in the Yangtze" tells Ma's story. The director, who worked with Ma early on, joins us.
contentencoded:
The Wall Street Journal has said that Alibaba is China’s internet crown jewel. The man behind it is Jack Ma, a former English teacher in China who came to the U.S. in the mid-90s and saw the potential for the internet in China.

A new film tells Ma’s story. It’s called “Crocodile in the Yangtze.” Its director, Porter Erisman, worked with Ma early on.Â Erisman joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to discuss the film and Jack Ma.
